title: 24hr November Charity Stream
body:
Hey guys.

I have held a few Charity Streams before in the past and it has nearly been two years since my first one. Please go to my facebook page to check out all the details there are RP prizes up for grabs + more.

Lets help people/children in need! My goal is to beat the current highest mark set at $400 with $600 raised this time.

replies.body: well u can expect a big donation from me :D
